Who am I? Who are you?

MSc computer science student. Too curious and refuses to specialize in one field because there are too many beautiful things to explore. Web advocate. Mozilla fanboy. Frustrated by (in my opinion) poor education systems. Trying to make sense out of everything around me, and failing horribly.

PS: If you're viewing this on a large screen, yes, I'm aware that the footer needs to be pushed downwards, thank you.

This site is hosted on github and uses Jekyll. Template is based on initializr
